title: ThresholdImage
description: Image thresholding utility that applies different thresholding techniques to an input image. It can use fixed thresholds, Otsu method, or K-means for thresholding.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimension of the input image.

image_in.title: Input Image
image_in.description: The input image file to be thresholded.

out_image.title: Output Image
out_image.description: The output image file after thresholding.

threshlo.title: Threshold Low
threshlo.description: The lower threshold value for fixed thresholding.

threshhi.title: Threshold High
threshhi.description: The upper threshold value for fixed thresholding.

inside_value.title: Inside Value
inside_value.description: The pixel value to be used inside the threshold range.

outside_value.title: Outside Value
outside_value.description: The pixel value to be used outside the threshold range.

otsu_number_of_thresholds.title: Otsu Number of Thresholds
otsu_number_of_thresholds.description: Number of thresholds to use when applying the Otsu method.

kmeans_number_of_thresholds.title: K-means Number of Thresholds
kmeans_number_of_thresholds.description: Number of thresholds to use when applying the K-means method.

mask_image.title: Mask Image
mask_image.description: Optional mask image for the thresholding operation.
